name: I've slept for long
description:
I tried using the bitsy editor to make a "game" where you are a ghost looking around a mansion, but ran out of room for tiles when I was starting the fourth room. I also misspelled some words. The tile issue brought this from something that would be spread over multiple days to something that I made in an evening.

Maybe I'll do something with the idea later, or fix the errors with this.

I can't expand on this game, but I'd like to know if anyone is interested in an expanded form of this.

Below is the game itself in its entirety, in case you want it.
